programme.title: Sunny Side Up
programme.desc: Heng's mood swings are out of control as his attempts to be a "new" man backfire. Damien shows proof that Sarah scammed him, causing Christine and Alex to find a way to resolve it with Rose. Hafiq splurges on an expensive purchase that ends up going down the drain.

programme.title: The Good Doctor S3
programme.desc: When Dr. Shaun Murphy makes an emotional confession, the result may not be as desired. Meanwhile, he becomes obsessed with performing an autopsy on a Jane Doe, which challenges his relationships at the hospital; the other doctors treat a college student with a mysterious split personality disorder.

programme.title: The Kelly Clarkson Show S3
programme.desc: Winner of Daytime Emmy Awards 2020 and 2021 for Outstanding Entertainment Talk Show Host and Outstanding Entertainment Talk Show. Won Outstanding Lighting Direction and Outstanding Art Direction/Set Decoration/Scenic Design for Daytime Emmy Awards 2020.

programme.title: Ellen's Game Of Games S3
programme.desc: New season of the popular and fun gameshow. Volunteers from Ellen's studio audience play her outrageously fun games including Dizzy Dash, Stink Tank, Say Whaaat?, See Ya Later, Alligator, Know or Go and more for the chance to win $100,000.

programme.title: Euromaxx
programme.desc: Euromaxx is a lifestyle magazine show which features images and stories that reflect the rich diversity of cultural life in Europe. It also provides an insight into Europe and the people who live there.

programme.title: Rachel Khoo's Chocolat!
programme.desc: Throughout this delectable series, international food creative, Rachel Khoo delves into the world of chocolate, taking inspiration from around the globe to create original, mouth-watering dishes. Super-chef Rachel, who trained at Le Cordon Bleu in Paris, meets some of the finest chocolatiers in Europe, investigates the fascinating history of chocolate and explores the health and wellbeing benefits of our favourite treat.

programme.title: Earth's Great Rivers
programme.desc: Embark on the ultimate river voyage down three of the world's most epic rivers - the Amazon, the Nile and the Mississippi. This series reveals the astonishing wildlife and breathtaking landscapes of these legendary waterways from their source to their mouth. The latest technology, previously unfilmed locations and drone footage reveals their true character in a way not seen before.

programme.title: The Deep S1
programme.desc: The series follows the Nekton family, a family of adventurous underwater explorers who live aboard a state-of-the-art submarine, the Aronnax, and explore unknown areas of the Earth's oceans to unravel the mysteries of the depths.

programme.desc: A dramatic day as returning contestants seek to fight their way back into the competition. In Round 2, another two home cooks will be eliminated in two 30minute heats cooking one of Singapore's favourite crustaceans - either fresh or canned.

programme.desc: Sinaran is a Malay musical-dance love story, set against the music of Malaysian superstar, Sheila Majid.
